This sky may be used free for non commercial purposes.
Just only drop me a short message. It also would be nice if you mention me in the credits. :)

Bitte sowohl die TGA- als auch die BMP-Dateien in den gfx/env-Ordner kopieren.
Please note to copy both file types (tga and bmp) to your gfx/env folder.

If you use Worldcraft / Hammer as editor, please set the light_environment as follows:
Pitch Yaw Roll (Y Z X): 0 207 0
Pitch: -12
Brightness: 254 225 78 XXX (the value for XXX depends from your map)
